    The pencil that burned the military was given five years of colony.

    The 61-year-old resident of the city of Usinsk of the Republic of Komi Nadezh Cornilov (Rosfinmonitoring added her to the list of terrorists and extremists) was found guilty of the terrorist attack, and the court sentenced her to five years of colony. The original woman who, on 11 April of this year, set fire to the Ousinsk military officer ' s door, was accused of attempting to commit a terrorist attack, but then re-qualified. The prosecutor asked for Cornil to be sentenced to 12 years of colony.
